name: Rabenland - The Prototype
description:
Hello there!

This is "Rabenland", the prototype. Don't feel bad if you have a hard time pronouncing it, it's a German word.

It's a 2D Platformer about a monster hunter where you have to use the environment to your advantage. It is still very early in development and this is the first prototype to get feedback about anything, so please fell free to comment or contact me on Twitter.

The prototype is around 10-15 minutes long.
Good luck and have fun!

With best regard,
Tobias Brunner

Official Discord: https://discord.gg/SBJKVhkhsc
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PudgeMeBaby
